```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```
 
```{r}
pp_data2 <- read.csv("./data/powerdata_2.csv")
test_ppdata <- pp_data2[-c(1:140), ]
el_gen2 <- {}
el_gen2 <- as.numeric(test_ppdata$发电量.火力.山西) + 
  as.numeric(test_ppdata$发电量.风力.山西) + 
  as.numeric(test_ppdata$发电量.水力.山西) + 
  as.numeric(test_ppdata$发电量.太阳能.山西)
el_gen2 <- el_gen2[8:12] %>% as.data.frame()
el_gen2$month <- c(3:7)
el_gen2[,1] <- el_gen2[,1]*10

pttt <- pt1[-c(1:2), ]
pttt <- cbind(pttt, el_gen2)
pttt$cha <- pttt$`sum(complete)` - pttt$.
pttt$cha[1:4] %>% mean()
```

```{r}
pp_data2 %>% names
fin_in_out <- pp_data2[,c(1, 21:42)]
fin_in_out %>% names
# in million CNY
# fiscal avanue, fiscal spending
fin_in_out <- fin_in_out[-(1:25), ]
names(fin_in_out)[1] <- "yearmonth"
fin_in_out$yearmonth1 <- as.Date(fin_in_out$yearmonth, "%m%Y")
```
